OPTIONS.IN_FUTURE: The feature will be available in the future

COMMON.SUBCATEGORY_DIALOG_DESC: Select the subcategories you are interested in, the selection of which can generate inspiration.
COMMON.RANDOM_SUBCATEGORY_TIP: Random subcategory - the image will be generated based on the general label: {{tag}}

STANDARD_MODE.SUB_TITLE: Standard module - get inspired by what you see.
STANDARD_MODE.DESCRIPTION: Choose the categories you are interested in. Based on them, the theme of your creative work will be generated. Draw, paint, sculpt!

PAGE_NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Page not found
PAGE_NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: Sorry, we can't find the page you are interested in.

LICENSE.DESCRIPTION_PREFIX: The application uses the resources of the website
LICENSE.DESCRIPTION_SUFFIX: . Unsplash photos are for free use.
LICENSE.ALLOW_1: All photos are free to download and use;
LICENSE.ALLOW_2: Commercial and non-commercial use is allowed;
LICENSE.ALLOW_3: No permission is required (although attribution is appreciated).
LICENSE.NOT_ALLOW_1: Selling photos without significantly modifying them;
LICENSE.NOT_ALLOW_2: Compiling photos from Unsplash to recreate a similar or competing service.
LICENSE.MORE_ON_SITE: More about the license can be found on the page:
LICENSE.COLLECTION_ON_SITE_PREFIX: All images assigned to the category (excluding the random category) are on the page
LICENSE.COLLECTION_ON_SITE_SUFFIX: . You can find all the information about the authors of the photos there if you want.
